text: Man in a Shell () is a 1939 Soviet drama movie directed by Isidor Annensky.К дню рождения Антона Чехова в Москве покажут «Человека в футляре»Человек в футляре (1939) It stars Nikolay Khmelyov, Mikhail Zharov, and Olga Androvskaya. == Actors == * Nikolay Khmelyov as Belikov * Mikhail Zharov as Mikhail Kovalenko * Olga Androvskaya as Varvara Kovalenko * Vladimir Gardin as School Principal == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1939 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Isidor Annensky
title: Man in a Shell
